meanings.definition: Relating to or involving two zones.
meanings.sent1: The bizonal map showed the different areas clearly.
meanings.sent2: The city had a bizonal structure with distinct districts.
meanings.sent3: The bizonal arrangement of the playground made it easy for kids to play different games.
meanings.sent4: Her bizonal approach to organizing events ensured both sides were equally represented.
meanings.sent5: The bizonal coloring of the flag symbolized unity between the two regions.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or divided into two zones.
meanings.sent1: The bizonal garden had flowers on one side and vegetables on the other.
meanings.sent2: The bizonal city planning aimed to balance residential and commercial areas.
meanings.sent3: The bizonal traffic system kept cars and bicycles separate for safety.
meanings.sent4: The bizonal bookshelf divided fiction and non-fiction books neatly.
meanings.sent5: The bizonal climate of the country varied greatly from north to south.
